entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
